attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK there are approximately 1,000,000 suffer of reumatoid arthritis which is an un-cureable desease.I petition that RA sufferers should be exempt from prescription charges as RA affects all ages and can result in high expence due to the high amount of drugs neccessary to control RA progression.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
